2.caption_en: A side‑by‑side radial diagram showing Amazon’s evolution from a focused online retailer in 1995–2000 to a sprawling 2019 ecosystem that reaches across living, mobility, health, work, education and entertainment. The 2019 chart highlights expanded offerings—Alexa, logistics, web services, payments, vehicles and even space travel—illustrating Amazon as an orchestrator of daily life and growing B2B exposure.
2.caption_ru: A side‑by‑side radial diagram showing Amazon’s evolution from a focused online retailer in 1995–2000 to a sprawling 2019 ecosystem that reaches across living, mobility, health, work, education and entertainment. The 2019 chart highlights expanded offerings—Alexa, logistics, web services, payments, vehicles and even space travel—illustrating Amazon as an orchestrator of daily life and growing B2B exposure.

4.caption_en:
This slide contrasts Amazon’s narrow e‑commerce footprint in 1995–2000 with its expansive 2019 ecosystem. By 2019 Amazon uses services and devices (e.g., Alexa) to orchestrate areas of living, mobility, health, work, consumption, education, social and entertainment and to grow B2B exposure.
